name: Echoes of Nocturnal Chords 夜弦之音
name_original: Echoes of Nocturnal Chords 夜弦之音
description:
The script, design, stand-up drawing and character CG of this game are original. Please do not unpack it yourself.
If you have any questions, please contact the author.
Try to reply and solve all the problems that everyone has in the game as soon as possible ~

Finally, I wish everyone a happy game ~! !! !!
